name: ANCEL DS500BT Bidirectional Scan Tool, Full-System Automotive Diagnostic Scanner with 28+ Services, Injector Coding, DPF/Brake/BMS/Oil/Gear/Throttle Functions, CAN FD Support, Lifetime Free Updates
short_description: [From Lag to Instant: Your Diagnostic Upgrade] - Stop waiting on slow boots and menu loads. The DS500BT, powered by a true Android 10 quad-core system and 7" touchscreen, boots in seconds and navigates with zero lag. This raw speed enables our exclusive one-touch shortcut: bypass 5+ layers of complex menus and access any of the 28+ special functions instantly. Transform minutes of searching into a one-second command

[NEWLY RELEASED Bi-Directional Diagnostic Tool] - Offers over 3000 bi-directional control and active test functions, covering key vehicle systems like fuel, electrical, emissions, body, and comfort. Real-time control via the vehicle's ECU allows you to trigger and verify key actuators (fuel injectors, fuel pumps, windows, wipers, mirrors, etc.) with ease. Control availability varies by vehicle model, but it significantly reduces diagnostic time, helping you pinpoint issues faster and with greater accuracy. Gain confidence and repair like a pro

[28+ Reset & Service Functions] - Quickly perform essential functions like Oil Reset, EPB Reset, ABS Bleeding, BMS Reset, SAS Calibration, Airbag Reset, and DPF Regeneration for routine repairs and maintenance. Unlock advanced features like Injector Coding, Gear Learning, and Brake Reset, designed for professional technicians and complex system recalibrations, enabling precise repairs and component replacements. Note: Function availability varies by vehicle make, model, and system design, which is standard across all diagnostic tools

[Comprehensive Full-System Diagnostics] - DS500BT offers thorough diagnostics for essential systems like engine, transmission, ABS, and SRS, plus extends to electrical, body, climate control, and comfort systems, helping you catch potential issues early and maintain your vehicle's peak performance. Early detection reduces the risk of breakdowns, prevents costly repairs, and extends vehicle lifespan

[No Subscription Fees – Lifetime Free Updates Included] - Many diagnostic tools provide only 2–3 years of free updates before charging annual renewal fees that typically range from $100 to $300 per year. This device includes lifetime free updates for both vehicle coverage and diagnostic feature modules, with no subscription costs. This helps you avoid ongoing update fees and reduce long-term ownership expenses while keeping new model support and service functions current. Applies to software updates only and does not include third-party access services required by certain vehicle manufacturers

[Premium Wireless VCI for Unrestricted Diagnostics] - Designed to elevate your workflow beyond the limits of traditional wired adapters, this professional wireless VCI delivers fast, stable BT 5.0 communication with strong resistance to interference. Its reliable 10m (33ft) range lets you move freely between the engine bay, cabin, and workbench without dragging cables, risking disconnections, or obstructing your workspace. Ideal for road tests, tight engine compartments, high-mounted OBD ports, and two-person diagnostics, helping create a cleaner, safer, and more efficient environment while maintaining continuous real-time data

[Future-Proof & Universal Compatibility] - Diagnose over 100,000 models of cars, SUVs, and light trucks (1996 and newer), with full-system diagnostics for both traditional CAN and the latest CAN FD protocol. Focused on 12V systems, making it ideal for gasoline and diesel vehicles. Note: For vehicles with manufacturer-specific security gateways (FCA/SGW), third-party authentication may be required, which is not included

[Instant Expert Support – Your Built-In Diagnostic Partner] - Get the support other tools can’t offer. Instead of waiting days for email replies, you can access our dedicated technical team directly through the built-in online chat window on the device. Send screenshots, error messages, or even short screen-recorded videos so experts can clearly understand your issue and provide accurate guidance in real time. For additional feedback, you can also submit reports through the in-tool Feedback section or by email. A faster, clearer, and more professional support experience—right from your scanner

name: BLCKTEC 460T OBD2 Scanner Car Code Reader Engine ABS SRS Transmission Diagnostic Tool, 12 Reset Services, Oil/TPMS/EPB/BMS/SAS/DPF/Throttle Reset, ABS Bleeding, Battery Test, Auto VIN, Free Update
short_description: [All System Diagnostics, Professional-Level Scanner] - BLCKTEC 460T is the ultimate OBD2 diagnostic tool for home mechanics and professionals. It supports all 10 OBD2 modes, reads and clears Engine/Transmission/ABS/SRS codes, performs All-System Diagnostics, offers workshop reset tools, and provides real-time live data. It helps you pinpoint issues, assess your car's condition, and prepare for SMOG checks with ease. NOTE: Function availability depends on your vehicle. Before you buy, be sure to use the Compatibility Checker on BLCKTEC website or contact our customer support to verify that the features you need are supported for your vehicle’s specific year, make, and model.

[12+ Most Popular Reset Functions] - BLCKTEC 460T OBD2 scanner offers 12+ dealer-level service functions, including Oil Maintenance Reset, ABS Bleeding, EPB Reset, SAS(Steering Angle Sensor) Recalibration, DPF(Diesel Particulate Filter) Reset, Throttle Body Relearn, Battery Reset/Initialization, TPMS Relearn, Transmission Reset, Fluid Change Reset, Maintenance Reset and more, enabling you to perform workshop services like a pro. NOTE: Function availability depends on your vehicle. Be sure to use the Compatibility Checker on BLCKTEC website to verify that the features you need are supported for your vehicle.

[Real-Time OBD2 and OEM Live Data, Freeze Frame Data] - BLCKTEC 460T helps diagnose vehicle issues when warning lights like Check Engine Light or ABS/SRS Light appear. It offers detailed DTC info, ECU Freeze Frame Data, and real-time OBD2 and advanced OEM live data, including Engine, Transmission, ABS, SRS, and more, making it easy to diagnose and resolve vehicle problems. You can view, graph, record, replay, and overlay up to four live data streams in a single graph for better analysis.

[AutoVIN, AutoReLink, AutoScan, 3X Faster] - Equipped with AutoVIN technology, 460T automatically retrieves the VIN to save you time. Its AutoScan and AutoReLink features scan all of the vehicle's ECUs and detect any fault codes immediately after you plug the scanner into the vehicle's OBD2 port - no button presses required. Additionally, it regathers DTC and I/M readiness information every 30 seconds, simplifying monitor tests. 460T's advanced technology makes it 3X faster than other products.

[Get RepairSolutions2, the #1 Auto Repair App for Free] - When paired with RepairSolutions2(RS2) App, 460T becomes even more powerful. RS2's Verified Fix Database built by master technicians, provides the parts needed for the repair. Additionally, RS2 gives you access to OEM warranty info, maintenance schedules, TSB, and dealership recall info, making car care easier than ever. RS2 is free with no subscription fees and it stores your car scan reports in the cloud, allowing you to access, share, or print them anytime and anywhere.

[Free Lifetime Update, Unmatched Vehicle Compatibility] - The BLCKTEC 460T comes with free lifetime updates, ensuring your scanner always has the latest diagnostic technology and supports new vehicle models. The 460T is compatible with all OBD2-compliant vehicles sold and registered in the USA and Canada from 1996 onward. This includes passenger cars, minivans, SUVs, pickups, light-duty trucks, and diesel vehicles manufactured by domestic, Asian, and European automakers.

[Check Compatibility Before You Buy] - BLCKTEC 460T and the App RepairSolutions2 can only be used in the USA and Canada, and other countries and regions will not be supported. While the product works on most OBD2-compliant vehicles 1996-2023 models, NOT all functions may be available on all cars. Before you buy, be sure to use the Compatibility Checker on BLCKTEC website or contact our customer support to ensure the features you need are supported for your specific vehicle’s year, make, and model.

[Designed & Supported in the USA] - Proudly based in Southern California, our OBD2 scanner is the brainchild by local Master Technicians. As a USA-based company, our customer service team is also located in the USA and provides support in both English and Spanish. Our support hotline at 1-866-909-6777 is available Monday to Friday, 6:00 AM to 6:00 PM Pacific Time. For additional contact information, please visit our website.
